/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional red and blue accents that add a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, hinting at a touch of nature amidst the city's concrete structures. The street itself is lined with trees and lampposts, adding to the urban charm of the scene. The image is bathed in the soft glow of daylight, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
